text: This House regrets the existence of Valentine's Day
This House would not buy Apple
This House would rather play with Lego than Barbie
This House believes that tomatoes are a fruit
This House would make an exception to laws forbidding indecent exposure for days with hot temperatures
This House would stop using cash
This House would make Esperanto mandatory in all schools in the world
This House would impose trade sanctions on countries that do not use the metric system
This House would ban timeouts in all team sports
This House would require every citizen to watch a film produced in their country every year
This House regrets our reliance on the internet
